item.title: Cross Posting - Other Blog Posts
item.description: Before creating this blog, I had the opportunity to create numerous posts under the SensePost blog. These cover a few topics including mobile apps, web apps and infrastructure. Here is a list of those posts, in chronological order, with a brief abstract about each post.
